programmes.show_description: A feature OJ hasn't done in a while is the Joke Off, so this morning OJ wants you to send in your best and worst jokes. Send them in on a voice note, and he if laughs then you win!

programmes.show_name: Sounds of the 90s with Fearne Cotton
programmes.show_description: If they were on your wall ripped out of Smash Hits magazine, we're playing them! Featuring Take That, Britney Spears and Peter Andre.

Sara plays the biggest and best tunes to get you up dancing!
Jo brings her Shiny Happy Playlist, 30 minutes of feel-good music from 7-7.30pm to soundtrack listeners' weekday evening.
Jo handpicks her favourite new music from all genres of the musical spectrum and quality vintage songs too.
Radio 2's Piano Room month is back, featuring the biggest stars performing with the BBC Concert Orchestra!

programmes.show_name: The Country Show with Bob Harris
programmes.show_description: Just got an hour? All the country you need to know, right here! Brand new exclusive music from the stars of today rubbing shoulders with all-time classics and much more besides.

programmes.show_description: Feel-good dancefloor favourites to make you groove, and DJ Spoony hits the decks for a live mix!

programmes.show_description: Dermot picks some of his favourite Brits winners of the 90s, including Pulp, Bjork and Belle & Sebastian.

programmes.show_name: The Rock Show with Shaun Keaveny
programmes.show_description: Shaun chats to Geddy Lee and Alex Lifeson from Rush following the announcement of a new tour, their first since the loss of drummer Neil Peart.
